item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 4, 2024 at 9:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. IMG_0001 (476 points | 61 comments)
2. OpenTTD is an open source simulation game based upon Transport Tycoon Deluxe (132 points | 31 comments)
3. A particle physics course for high-school students (106 points | 3 comments)
4. Egoless Engineering (499 points | 184 comments)
5. My son (9 yrs old) used plain JavaScript to make a game, and wants your feedback (540 points | 267 comments)
6. Show HN: Open-Source Colab Notebooks to Implement Advanced RAG Techniques (54 points | 6 comments)
7. Intel announces Arc B-series "Battlemage" discrete graphics with Linux support (410 points | 591 comments)
8. No Nat November: My Month Without IPv4 (103 points | 48 comments)
9. FTC takes action against Gravy Analytics, Venntel for selling location data (158 points | 127 comments)
10. Glojure: Clojure interpreter hosted on Go, with extensible interop support (145 points | 24 comments)
11. Skia Canvas: Browserless implementation of the HTML Canvas drawing API for node (235 points | 71 comments)
12. Getting Started with Category Theory (10 points | discuss)
13. Pinecone integrates AI inferencing with vector database (4 points | discuss)
14. Making a parallel Rust workload 10x faster with (or without) Rayon (93 points | 22 comments)
15. Show HN: My C compiler compiled itself (153 points | 46 comments)
16. The Tube Computer (170 points | 51 comments)
17. The Porsche Macan EV is being recalled because its headlights are too bright (63 points | 122 comments)
18. Gratitude despite the odds (38 points | 3 comments)
19. A new home for Python-build-standalone (77 points | 18 comments)
20. Creating a Proxmox or QEMU ChromeOS Flex VM (60 points | 16 comments)
21. Making AWS News stupid fast with smart caching (19 points | 2 comments)
22. Phoenix LiveView 1.0.0 is here (460 points | 79 comments)
23. Dependency management fatigue, or why I ditched React for Go+HTMX+Templ (222 points | 204 comments)
24. EmacsConf 2024 (99 points | 1 comment)
25. Voice Activity Detection in Elixir with Membran (26 points | 1 comment)
26. Formaldehyde Causes More Cancer Than Any Other Toxic Air Pollutant (101 points | 47 comments)
27. Phishers Love New TLDs Like .shop, .top and .xyz (133 points | 159 comments)
28. Rust library for building no-boilerplate CLI apps (41 points | 6 comments)
29. Stephen King to shut down his 3 radio stations in Maine (90 points | 126 comments)
30. Openlayer (YC S21) is looking for top-tier design engineers ( | hide)
